game.beginning: A lonely knight, Sir Lancelot, sets out on a journey to rescue a captured princess from the clutches of an evil sorcerer.
game.ending: After battling through treacherous dungeons and defeating challenging monsters, Sir Lancelot finally confronts the sorcerer and frees the princess from captivity, restoring peace to the kingdom.
game.synopsis: Embark on an epic quest as Sir Lancelot, a brave knight determined to save a princess from the clutches of an evil sorcerer. Overcome dangerous obstacles and foes in treacherous dungeons to reach the final showdown with the sorcerer and bring peace back to the kingdom.
game.title: Knight's Quest
